comment: когда игрок проходит занавес: занавес баркает

languages.text: Плотный полог занавеса пытается оттолкнуть вас, выпихнуть прочь с неожиданной для бездушной тряпки силой.
The thick curtain shoves you away. It is surprisingly strong for a lifeless piece of fabric.
languages.original_text: Плотный полог занавеса пытается оттолкнуть вас, выпихнуть прочь с неожиданной для бездушной тряпки силой.

traits.locale_text: The thick curtain shoves you away. It is surprisingly strong for a lifeless piece of fabric.
The thick curtain shoves you away. It is surprisingly strong for a lifeless piece of fabric.
The thick curtain shoves you away. It is surprisingly strong for a lifeless piece of fabric.
The thick curtain shoves you away. It is surprisingly strong for a lifeless piece of fabric.
The thick curtain shoves you away. It is surprisingly strong for a lifeless piece of fabric.
The thick curtain shoves you away. It is surprisingly strong for a lifeless piece of fabric.

languages.text: 分厚いカーテンがあなたを押しやろうとする。生気のない布にしては驚くほど丈夫だ。
languages.original_text: The thick curtain shoves you away. It is surprisingly strong for a lifeless piece of fabric.

traits.locale_text: 分厚いカーテンがあなたを押しやろうとする。生気のない布にしては驚くほど丈夫だ。

languages.text: 厚窗帘将你推开了。尽管它只是一块没有生命的织物，但它的强度惊人。
languages.original_text: The thick curtain shoves you away. It is surprisingly strong for a lifeless piece of fabric.

traits.locale_text: 厚窗帘将你推开了。尽管它只是一块没有生命的织物，但它的强度惊人。

languages.text: La gruesa cortina te empuja. Es sorprendentemente fuerte para ser un trozo de tela sin vida.
languages.original_text: The thick curtain shoves you away. It is surprisingly strong for a lifeless piece of fabric.

traits.locale_text: La gruesa cortina te empuja. Es sorprendentemente fuerte para ser un trozo de tela sin vida.

languages.text: Der dicke Vorhang schubst dich beiseite. Für ein lebloses Stück Stoff ist er überraschend stark.
languages.original_text: The thick curtain shoves you away. It is surprisingly strong for a lifeless piece of fabric.

traits.locale_text: Der dicke Vorhang schubst dich beiseite. Für ein lebloses Stück Stoff ist er überraschend stark.

languages.text: Le rideau épais vous repousse. Pour un simple morceau de tissu, il déploie une force surprenante.
languages.original_text: The thick curtain shoves you away. It is surprisingly strong for a lifeless piece of fabric.

traits.locale_text: Le rideau épais vous repousse. Pour un simple morceau de tissu, il déploie une force surprenante.

languages.text: Kalın perde seni geri itiyor. Cansız bir kumaş parçasına göre şaşırtıcı derecede güçlü.
languages.original_text: The thick curtain shoves you away. It is surprisingly strong for a lifeless piece of fabric.

traits.locale_text: Kalın perde seni geri itiyor. Cansız bir kumaş parçasına göre şaşırtıcı derecede güçlü.
